mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pet(petno,memberno,name, age, gender, pet_type, neutralization,weight,files,thumbs,filesizes) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(petno), 0)+1 as petno FROM pet), #{memberno},#{name}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{pet_type}, #{neutralization}, #{weight}, #{files}, #{thumbs}, #{filesizes})
mapper.select: SELECT petno,memberno,name, age, gender, pet_type, neutralization, weight,files,thumbs,filesizes FROM pet ORDER BY petno ASC
SELECT petno,memberno,name, age, gender, pet_type, neutralization,weight,files,thumbs,filesizes FROM pet WHERE name LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%' ORDER BY petno DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM pet WHERE name LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
SELECT petno,memberno,name, age, gender, pet_type, neutralization,weight,files,thumbs,filesizes FROM pet WHERE memberno = #{memberno} ORDER BY petno DESC
